news.title: Homebuyers' body FPCE wants RERA to be made functional in West Bengal
news.para: ​In May last year, the Supreme Court had struck down the West Bengal government's law WBHIRA for regulating real estate sector, saying it was "unconstitutional".

news.title: Karnataka: Case registered against BDA officials for Rs 100 crore land scam
news.para: ​Vishwanath, who is also the Yelahanka MLA in the city, said in a statement that the officials colluded with one Nagaraj. He, however, did not name the officials involved in the alleged fraud and the number of authorities was also not mentioned.

news.title: Soon, a land bank for infrastructure projects in Gurugram
news.para: On Saturday, deputy commissioner Nishant Yadav directed officials to prepare the list of available plots in 15 days and ensure they were free from any litigation or legal disputes.

news.title: Chennai: Soon, movie tickets, gift vouchers as rewards for paying property tax
news.para: The civic body in a statement on Saturday said it is in talks with the banks to create a facility for paying property tax and provide rewards.

news.title: Kolkata civic body to list unauthorized buildings in city, publish it on website
news.para: Mayor Firhad Hakim on Saturday asked municipal commissioner Binod Kumar to take a prompt and effective step in this direction.

news.title: Kanpur: Notices to 429 owners asking to demolish rundown buildings
news.para: Municipal commissioner Shivasharanappa GN on Friday convened a meeting with chief engineer SK Singh, zonal engineers and assistant engineers and asked them to issue notices to such house owners.

news.title: About 83,000 owners pay Rs 48.7 crore property tax to Chandigarh civic body in Q1 FY23
news.para: Sources said Rs 13.70 crore came from 66,500 people under residential segment, around 34.17 crore from 16,500 commercial property owners and Rs 80 lakh from MC’s own entries against transfer of properties.

news.title: Tamil Nadu: New government flats for urban poor have lifts, STP
news.para: After paying just ₹1.5 lakh for a 406sqft flat (a similarly sized apartment bought from a private builder in the area will cost at least 10 times more), they are thrilled that they have been provided with state-of-the art facilities.

news.title: Gurugram: Put off upkeep fee till IIT report comes, say Chintels Paradiso residents
news.para: They also demanded a rollback of power backup charge hike. The residents claimed that the diesel generator charges have been increased up to Rs 36 per unit, which “is arbitrary and unjustified”.

news.title: Pune: MahaRERA lists 2,809 projects with bookings in lapsed category
news.para: Most of the “lapsed” projects with bookings were in Pune (834), followed by Mumbai (582) and Thane (354), MahaRERA data revealed.

news.title: MahaRERA standardises home allotment letters for realtors
news.para: The newly introduced allotment letter would require developers to mention the date of handing over the possession of the booked property, percentage of charges levied on cancellation of booking, parking allotment and other details.

news.title: Kolhapur civic body gets 206 building plans in manual mode on June 30
news.para: ​The unified rules have come into place across all civic bodies except for Mumbai, to ensure that the development takes place uniformly across the state.

news.title: Fix flaws in civic amenities in colonies taken over: Gurugram civic body commissioner
news.para: ​Commissioner Mukesh Kumar Ahuja fixed a deadline of 24 hours to resolve the problems. He has also appointed new nodal officers to oversee the services in these colonies.

news.title: Beneficiaries of housing scheme in Vijayawada sell plots
news.para: Despite guidelines against the sale of plots, around 190 beneficiaries have already sold their plots through agreements on stamp papers.

news.title: Ahmedabad most affordable housing market among top eight cities: Report
news.para: Ahmedabad is the most affordable housing market amongst the top eight cities, with a ratio of 22 per cent followed by Pune and Chennai at 26 per cent each in the first half of the calendar year 2022, the property consultant said in a statement.
